description: Non-supine RDI at 3% desaturation  [(total number of apneas and hypopneas in non-supine body position associated with >= 3% desaturation) / (hours of sleep)]. will be missing if no time non-supine or low position sensor quality.
calculations: 60*(hrop3 +   hnrop3 + carop3 + canop3 + oarop3 + oanop3 + marop3 + manrop3)/(remepop+nremepop)
